section.30: Divination and Omens (Kitab Al-Kahanah Wa Al-Tatayyur)

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir ibn Abdullah: The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) took a man who was suffering from tubercular leprosy by the hand; he then put it along with his own hand in the dish and said: Eat with confidence in Allah and trust in Him
